author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Enable the analysis code for HGCal TB for 6-inch wafer to run properly

#### PR validation:

Use the test codes in SimG4CMS/HGCalTestBeam/test

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-tb75 Enable the analysis code for HGCal TB for 6-inch wafer to run properly
